data.title: OpenAI: Deep Research has been launched to all professional users in the UK and other countries
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to OpenAI’s announcement on the X platform, the Deep Research feature is now fully open to ChatGPT Pro users in all supported regions, including the UK, EU, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein, and Switzerland. Previously, the feature was gradually pushed to some users, and this expansion means that Pro users can access this enhanced feature worldwide.

data.title: NYSE Seeks Approval to Convert Grayscale LTC Trust to Spot Litecoin ETF
data.description: According to Odaily, the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) has submitted an application to regulatory authorities to convert the Grayscale Litecoin Trust into a spot Litecoin Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF).

data.title: Federal Reserve's Barkin Discusses Cybersecurity and Economic Outlook
data.description: According to Odaily, Federal Reserve official Thomas Barkin highlighted during a recent fireside chat that the Federal Reserve frequently faces cyberattacks. He also expressed optimism about the economic outlook, predicting that inflation will continue to decline and affirming that the fundamental economic conditions in the United States remain robust.

data.title: OpenAI Expands Deep Research Feature to All ChatGPT Pro Users
data.description: According to Odaily, OpenAI has announced that its Deep Research feature is now fully available to all ChatGPT Pro users. This expansion includes supported regions such as the United Kingdom, the European Union, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein, and Switzerland. Previously, the feature was gradually rolled out to select users, but this latest development ensures that Pro users worldwide can access the enhanced functionality.

data.title: Zack Kass, former head of OpenAI applications: DeepSeek accelerates AI parity
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: DeepSeek-R1 has attracted great attention from global investors in the past week. Zack Kass, former head of global market applications at OpenAI and an expert in artificial intelligence and business strategy, said that DeepSeek is a huge success and exciting. According to the Jevons Paradox, if a resource becomes more efficient, it will only make it more used. In the future, AI may become as cheap and ubiquitous as the Internet. (Jinshi)

data.title: DeepSeek—R1 Gains Global Attention Amid AI Advancements
data.description: According to Odaily, the past week has seen significant global interest in DeepSeek—R1. Zack Kass, former head of global market applications at OpenAI and an expert in artificial intelligence and business strategy, described DeepSeek as a tremendous success and exciting development. He referenced Jevons Paradox, which suggests that as a resource becomes more efficient, its usage increases. Kass indicated that AI might become as affordable and ubiquitous as the internet in the future.

data.title: Fed's Barkin: Fed often suffers from cyber attacks
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: Fed Chairman Barkin said during a fireside chat that the Fed is often attacked by cyber attacks. He also said that inflation is expected to continue to decline and the basic economic conditions of the United States are very healthy. (Jinshi)

data.title: NYSE applies to convert Grayscale LTC Trust Fund into spot ETF
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to market news, NYSE has submitted an application to regulators to convert the Grayscale LTC Trust Fund into a spot Litecoin ETF.

data.title: Blocksquare launches EU-compliant real estate tokenization framework
data.description:
The EU’s MiCA regulation was a foundational element of the new real estate tokenization platform, laying the legal groundwork for the initiative, according to Blocksquare.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/blocksquare-first-eu-compliant-real-estate-tokenization-framework?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: Token trading infrastructure Reservoir completes $14 million Series A financing, led by USV
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Token trading infrastructure Reservoir has completed a $14 million Series A financing, led by USV, with participation from Coinbase Ventures, Variant, Archetype, 1kx, etc. As part of the transaction, Union Square Ventures partner Nick Grossman will join the Reservoir board of directors. 
As of now, Reservoir's total financing has reached $26 million. The startup previously raised $10 million in a seed round led by Archetype at the end of 2022, and $2 million in a pre-seed round led by Variant in 2021. (TheBlock)
